Uses of Class
Funds.DataObjects.Account

  • Packages that use Account 
    Package Description
    Funds
    The .java and .fxml files relating to the primary Graphical User Interface for this application.
    Funds.DataObjects
    The actual Java bean style data organizing classes for this project
    Funds.Dialogs
    In an attempt to minimize clutter that typically comes along with GUI's on accounting software most user interaction is handled via dialog boxes and this package holds all of the .java controllers and .fxml GUI's in an attempt to keep this mess of files somewhat organized.
    Funds.Tools.BookExport
    At times it is necessary to send data from a program elsewhere for processing, this object allows data to exported in the four most common formats for transferring and handling data: XML, JSON, CSV, SQL.
    Funds.Tools.Budgeting.RevenueSplitter
    Revenue often comes in as one lump sum but needs distributed to a number of accounts this tool performs the calculations when these distributions are percentage based
    Funds.Tools.GeneralLedger
    By the nature of accounting software it may remain in use for quite some time, which means that the list of transactions being tracked can grow quite extensive, this tool provides filter and view options for sorting through the list of transactions recorded in the book.
